meanings.definition: The act of riding a wave without a board.
meanings.sent1: Bodysurfings can be thrilling as you ride the wave with just your body.
meanings.sent2: During summer, many people enjoy bodysurfings at the beach.
meanings.sent3: When the waves were big, Sarah's bodysurfings skills really shone.
meanings.sent4: His graceful bodysurfings reminded me of a dolphin gliding through the water.
meanings.sent5: The art of bodysurfings requires skill and balance to catch the perfect wave.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of riding a wave using only one's body.
meanings.sent1: Competing in bodysurfings contests can be challenging but fun.
meanings.sent2: Many beachgoers gather to watch the exciting bodysurfings competition.
meanings.sent3: In a surprising turn of events, the penguin excelled at bodysurfings.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for bodysurfings was as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The beach was alive with the sounds of laughter and bodysurfings enthusiasts.

meanings.definition: The practice of catching and riding waves using one's own body as a surfboard.
meanings.sent1: Learning the techniques of bodysurfings takes time and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The art of bodysurfings allows you to feel one with the ocean.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at bodysurfings ended with a comical splash.
meanings.sent4: The freedom of bodysurfings is unmatched by any other water sport.
meanings.sent5: The sun glistened on the water as he mastered the art of bodysurfings.
